news.headline: This World Prematurity Day, Pampers is enabling essential moments of bonding, as 92% of parents of premature babies said that physical touch made them feel more connected to their little ones[1]
news.summary: Touch is crucial to all babies' development, but with skin twice as thin as that of a full-term baby, premature babies' skin can often be very fragile[2].
